verbs.description: [ARG1: Jim Carrey] [V: went] [ARG4: back to the drawing board] [ARGM-TMP: over the weekend] , and on Monday posted a new illustration of Melania Trump on his Twitter , having depicted her like a character in A Clockwork Orange .

Jim Carrey went back to the drawing board over the weekend , and on Monday posted a new illustration of Melania Trump on his Twitter , [V: having] depicted her like a character in A Clockwork Orange .
